message: Let's split it fairly, Bob. Accept and we can end this!
I appreciate your fairness, Alice, but I believe a more balanced split is possible. Let's try this, and see if we can end this round.
I'm willing to compromise, Bob. Meet me halfway!
Alice, we're both losing money with each passing round. I believe this offer is fair, considering the depreciation.  Let's agree and move on.
Let's meet in the middle, Bob. It's time to make a deal!
